templates.name: When do the points expire?
templates.content: All points expire after 1 year.

templates.name: Do you offer free returns?
templates.content: Yes, we do offer free returns!

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: All orders placed on our site ship from our warehouse in Long Island City, New York.

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.maxaroma.com/track-order.html

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Customer wants a discount
templates.content: I'm happy to check if we have some discounts! What brand are you looking to get today?

templates.name: Sold Out Product Rec [INSERT LINK]
templates.content: Sorry that product is sold out at the moment. What do you think about this instead [link]?

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free standard shipping on all domestic orders.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 844-552-7662 or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at info@maxaroma.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Do you price match
templates.content: To request that, please e-mail us at info@maxaroma.com with the item information, including a link to the same item offered by the competitor we are price matching. For more info on that, feel free to check out this link: https://maxaroma.attn.tv/sl/Rv-hghvV

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content:
Thank you for your interest! You can register for wholesale here - https://www.maxaroma.com/wholesaleregister.html

For other wholesale inquiries, please email us directly at sale@maxaroma.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.maxaroma.com/site-page/returns-policy.html

templates.name: Do you have any discount for Aaron Terence Hughes fragrances?
templates.content: We don't have any codes available for Aaron Terence Hughes fragrances at the moment.

templates.name: Is the packaging new? The fragrance looks/smells different
templates.content: We pride ourselves on providing 100% authentic fragrances from many designer brands as well as niche brands. Please be aware that manufacturers might change their formulas and/or their packaging as well. When it comes to handmade products, the performance will vary from batch to batch and that will depend on the manufacturer.  As you may understand, we're not in control of any changes manufacturers decide to do with their products. Also, there's a good chance that you're comparing the product you received with another one from a different batch.

templates.name: Order Upsell
templates.content: By the way, one of our candles would go really well with your order: https://www.maxaroma.com/roja-dove/p4u/mid-634/view

templates.name: To help with your decision
templates.content: To help with your decision today, check out our gift sets, they're perfect if you're buying for someone or for yourself: https://www.maxaroma.com/p4u/key-gift-set/view

templates.name: Just Looking Best Sellers
templates.content:
Sounds good. Here are our most popular products at the moment https://www.maxaroma.com/best-seller-trio-bundles/tpid/8
Does anything catch your eye?

templates.name: Do you have samples/testers?
templates.content: You can check out all our testers here: https://maxaroma.attn.tv/sl/cbOd3CmW

templates.name: My item arrived damaged / broken
templates.content: I'm sorry to hear that! We're happy to offer you a full refund or exchange if you received any bottles that are defective. You can request a return on our website through this link: https://www.maxaroma.com/site-page/returns-policy.html

templates.name: Military / First responder discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! We don't have any specific discounts like that but if it helps, you can check out our current offers here: https://www.maxaroma.com/offers.html

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to email us directly at customercare@maxaroma.com or give us a call at 1-844-552-7662. Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/maxaroma/ and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/yousmellawesome/

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please submit your request at customercare@maxaroma.com or feel free to call this number 1-844-552-7662. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help out!

templates.name: Restock? (autosend enabled)
templates.content: I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock, but I recommend signing up on the product page so you're notified the second it comes back in!

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our standard processing time for in-stock items is 1-2 business days. We usually ship via USPS, FedEx and UPS, and once shipped it will take 5-8 business days domestically and 7-12 business days internationally.

templates.name: Rewards / referral program
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.maxaroma.com/reward-point-program.html

templates.name: Post Purchase Inquiries
templates.content: We don't handle post-purchase requests via text. Please submit your request at  customercare@maxaroma.com or feel free to call this number 1-844-552-7662. Please let me know if you have any questions about our products, I'm more than happy to help out!

templates.name: Sales Collection
templates.content: You can take a look at our sale collection here: https://www.maxaroma.com/offers.html

templates.name: How to start a return
templates.content: To start a return, please submit a request at the following link: https://www.maxaroma.com/track-order.html
